textlines: - We have ordered 50 000 cans of Power King. The taurin will help save the cats from blindness and heart failure.
- Never heard of that before. Isn't it supposed to be Red Bull?
- It's the same thing, just a different brand. Power King took the first leap into the space age ages ago, and they have a distribution network spanning two solar systems by now.
- Turns out you don't need wings in space.
